Reviews.Title: “this place is the biggest dump I've ever stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: george12678965
Reviews.Content: Discusting, couldnt sleep due to no curtains on the back window. Smells horrible. Gritty floors due to sand. They make you pay everything up front before seeing the room . Rules are unbelievable. Itchy bed, doors were almost impossible to open or close. Furniture was as old as the greek gods. Tv was dirty and small about 19inches, satellite kept knocking out. Spiders in the corner. No towels in bathroom. I would not recommend this dump to anyone there's plenty of other decent places to stay around here don't waste your money!

Reviews.Title: “Terrible!”
Reviews.Author: Tanya M
Reviews.Content: First of all absolutely horrible customer service. Second if something of your will be stolen police will not respond right away since the management abuses their services so much calling the cops for NO reason. For example when our friend who DOESN'T stay with us wanted to use the restroom in our room not only the cops were called but also we were yelled by the management. So if you wanna have a good vacation spend extra dollars but stay away from that place. A quote from one of the managers "We have our clientele so you can pack your stuff and leave". And I bet their clientele is their family members and friends since noone else will put up with that craziness.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, close to beach & attractions, great value!!”
Reviews.Author: BunnysMama
Reviews.Content: I chose this motel for the price, pool, close proximity to restaraunts & Jolly Roger amusement park. It is not the Ritz, don't expect 300 thread count sheets, or anything like that. There were no toiletries, which is fine for us as we brought our own. Really the only cons for me was that the mattress wasn't super comfortable, and that there were people smoking & drinking out front most of the day & night. I traveled with my young daughter, mom, & sister. Over all, the value is pretty good! You ice get cold A/C, mini-fridge, microwave, pool with outdoor shower (so you can clean up from the beach), its 1 block from the beach, and our room had laminate wood floors. Restaraunts are within walking distance, there is a beach store next door which came in handy for my family, pancake restaurant a few doors down, Jolly Roger amusement park is right across the street, 1 block down. We had an enjoyable stay here and would reccommend it for budget-conscious travelers!

Reviews.Title: “Rude, dirty and unpleasant”
Reviews.Author: katec57589
Reviews.Content: A friend and I along with a total of 4 kids stayed for 2 nights and found the manager and staff to be extremely rude and unpleasant. The lady even yelled at a friend of ours who stopped by to chat and told her to go home now and that she couldn't sit at the pool unless we paid for her. The rooms were not great, smelled and were very dark. Even the main lobby area was so mildew smelling that I had to cover my nose when we walked in. The only thing nice about the place was the pool and I think it was only because it was so hot! I would never stay in this motel ever again. Not only did the manager ruin our first few days of vacation, but the accommodations were terrible!

Reviews.Title: “Nice family owned motel.”
Reviews.Author: mike17921
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the Kings Arms for many years. It has always been an enjoyable stay at a reasonable price. We just came back yesterday from bike week there and had a great time. If you want a nice quiet place to stay this is it. We reserve the same room every time we go there. It is one block from the boardwalk or the bay. Mike Postick Ashland, PA

Reviews.Title: “clean, economical, friendly, close to everything”
Reviews.Author: sjkate
Reviews.Content: An economical place with no frills. The room was clean and included a table and two chairs. We had a king bed - pillows and bed were both comfortable. There was plenty of room for our coolers, bicycles, and luggage. Room included a microwave and a refrigerator. Initially the refrigerator was turned off and i was worried it didn't work, but it was up and running well by the time we came back from dinner. The microwave worked fine. We couldn't find the channel we wanted to watch. The service guy was very sweet and came back twice to help us find the program. The pool was clean with plenty of chairs, but located next to a busy street. They have an outside foot shower. Bring your own shampoo/conditioner and tissues. The towels were small and thin but did the job. The maid gave us some extra towels. A (7-11) convenience store is two blocks away, the beach and boardwalk is one very small block away. The motel is situated just outside the busiest area of the boardwalk so the traffic is a little lighter. A great location. Close to miniature golf, restaurants, and amusement park. I would stay here again for the price and convenience.

Reviews.Title: “Keep Looking”
Reviews.Author: StaceyB2011
Reviews.Content: I wish after reading these reviews on this motel I could've cancelled and not lost any money. One person commented on how bad their clothes all smelled of mold, she was right. At first it smells damp when you walk in and then you shut the door and you feel like you are in a dungeon. It was very dark. I noticed the smell on my sweater I wore out to dinner one night, it made me sick. Not to mention that we weren't told that it was Senior Week the week we made our reservation. The mouths on these teenagers. We couldn't even sit out on the chairs because of their language. So I have decided for all future vacations I will only at better name hotels or condos, yes I expect to pay more but after having to wash every piece of clothing twice and having the feeling I did everytime we had to walk back in that place, I don't care how much it costs me. Please keep looking. This is the perfect place for rowdy teenagers, not families.

Reviews.Title: “I don't like to be treated like a child.”
Reviews.Author: Guest112
Reviews.Content: When we got to the Kings Arms we immediately realized how small the room were. Then the kids were running all around the room and then sat on the bed and I saw their feet. They were BLACK! The carpets are extremely disgusting! The bathrooms are cleaned daily but u would never have known it. I think it is because the place has not been updated ina really long time. Also if u stay here please make sure you bring your own towels and wash cloths!! They give you ones that are paper thin and don't smell the best. I probably would recommend this place to a very young couple without children or a single young person. I couldn't get my kids to understand the concept that they had to wear their shoes in the room. There was also no where to hang up your beach towels and if u did hang them up in the restroom they didn't dry. Don't ask for anything extra or you might have the person from the desk at your door. Also do not take your laptop expecting to be able to access the internet. There are no directions and they say they have wireless internet and tell you how to get on it in another language. I am very computer savvy and I could not figure out how to use it. I thankfully brought my aircard on the trip. Also make sure you have a cell phone because there are no phones in the rooms. I have never in my life stayed at a motel where there was no phone in the room. I personally didn't feel comfortable having no phone in the room. The pool opens in the morning late and closes in the morning early. I just felt like the owners were constantly watching ur every move. I can understand that you probably get all kinds of people but u shouldn't run away new customers due to past bad experiences. But again, you get what you pay for. The beds are so uncomfortable and u will have to see ur chiropractor upon return. But other than that, the location itself is wonderful!!

Reviews.Title: “Not the worst I've ever stayed, but far from the best”
Reviews.Author: cherryiice
Reviews.Content: I guess it depends on how high your standards are, but I must say that I was pretty disappointed with my stay at this motel. My ex (who was pretty cheap with pretty low standards) did not seem bothered by it however. The rooms were not as clean as I would have liked, and were incredibly unattractive. The tv in our room was broken, and so we had to be moved to a different room upon discovery of this fact. What bothered me the most, however, was the service. Not only were the people in charge completely unbothered by any of the problems brought to their attention, they were also completely unmotivated to make up for the inconveniences experienced. And when I needed an extra blanket in the middle of the night, I was S.O.L, because the front desk is completely unmanned from 11pm to 6am and no one answers the number posted on the door. The situation would have to be pretty desperate to convince me to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “What a Dive!”
Reviews.Author: Hawk13
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed. We usually stay at The Shagri la or The Seahawk but they were booked. The rooms were musty. Our toilet did not work. It was the original toilet that was first put in the hotel and nothing inside of it had been replaced.. The bed sheet would not stay on. The pillows were flat. The wifi was a joke. The staff spoke poor english and were not very helpful. Our back window had a view of trash in the grass. There were not enough towels. The person writes the hotel policies is contradictory and does not know any proper grammar. It really needs remodeled and given some TLC. It could be a nice motel. Also the gutters leaked really bad when it rained. The location was nice and so was the pool. I will not stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Horrifying *** Do not Stay *** PLEASE”
Reviews.Author: yodapitts
Reviews.Content: What a MESS! My family and I have stayed here for years and finally got fed up. We have stayed here for over a decade, but they have stopped screening their guest. Let me tell you what happened. Last year, the first day we woke up there was broken glass and blood everywhere. Guest had fought overnight and it looked like an episode from Cops. Great for young children to see and to look forward to all year! Then it gets better. Swimming at the pool is an experience to remeber. If you love people who spit, hocker and do mailmans, then this is the place for you. SWIM AT YOUR OWN RISK! The landscaping is beautiful too. The little amount of grass and weeds is to much to maintain. Also, if you like wood paneling and the Austin Powers vibe then you will really enjoy the rooms. I swear 20/20 did an episode here if you know what I mean.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best motels in oc”
Reviews.Author: jason123456lb
Reviews.Content: Me my wife and two kids went to the kings arms for the first time three ago and it was just a drive in ocean city and we found this small motel. The rooms are great for a family of four the pool is big and the ocean is just there. The rooms are very clean the service is A+ the front desk people are great with helping us all the time and the one thing i like about the Kings Arms is that they alwasy try to rent to familys we have made some good friends there over the years that we have been going to ocean city. The motel is not over priced like some of the places in ocean city and it is always a great place to stay and enjoy your vacaton with your family. Its a great place

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: jeffman
Reviews.Content: My family and I recently stayed at the Kings Arms Motel. It was clean, very affordable and just a nice hotel. A nice pool and lots of cable channels. The only drawback was that it was far from the major boardwalk attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Worth the price”
Reviews.Author: tpwst5
Reviews.Content: I'm rating this above average because of the price. I found it very clean, which is the most important characteristic of a cheap motel. I would return but not for more than three nights. The location is great, walking distance from Phillip's. The bad parts(sort of expected for the price paid) : The maid service was so so, they didn't give shampoo, and the bed was springy.

Reviews.Title: “It gets a grade of D+”
Reviews.Author: etown7
Reviews.Content: This hotel had several problems, in my opinion. First, as soon as you walk in, the smell hits you. It has a strong musty and moldy smell. Not the typical smell from a beach hotel but a definite old moldy smell. It was so bad that we had to purchase a freshner for the room and even that didn't help. It was overpowering. Even the linens had a stale musty smell. The shower was falling off the wall and gave little water. The bathroom window glass was broken on the top. Bathroom just a mess. That among some other room issues made it an unpleasant stay. We left a day early. However, to the hotels credit, it is in a very good location and close to the boardwalk.

HotelInfo.Name: Kings Arms Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 2403 Baltimore Avenue, Ocean City, MD 21842
